name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It’s daylight-saving time, when we lose an hour of our lives. It’s like nature’s version of Facebook.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Why couldn’t they spring forward an hour during the Oscars?

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The movie “Battle: Los Angeles” is unrealistic because America’s army goes all out to defend L.A. If aliens really attacked L.A., Americans would say “Take it.”
